channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17804] Vectorization: Bug erroneously causes match for 1st row in batch (SelectStringColLikeStringScalar)
item.description: Code setting output value to LongColumnVector.NULL_VALUE for null candidate sets the 0th entry instead of the i'th.
item.summary: Vectorization: Bug erroneously causes match for 1st row in batch (SelectStringColLikeStringScalar)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
